name: Arbitrove ALP
description: Arbitrove Protocol is a yield-bearing index protocol that allows people to one-click mint an index that give exposure to a batch of strategies consist of yield-bearing assets. Unlike traditional index protocol that only hold tokens, Arbitrove Protocol dynamically deploy capital to strategies. ALP is the first index demonstrating Arbitrove's uniqueness which reflects the price of a group of Arbitrum ecosystem tokens.
